start_message: Hey! Here you can get codes from Hamster Fam games
new_start_message: Hey! Here you can get codes from Hamster Fam games. Launch the mini-app to generate your codes (Get Codes button below, or Open app in the bot description)

no_codes: The codes are over. Try again later
